summary: This document appears to be metadata or a calendar entry for a hearing on Jeffrey Epstein's motion to stay, scheduled for June 12, 2009, in the afternoon. The entry includes organizer and location details, and was created/modified in 2015, suggesting it is part of a later case management or archival system.
